text: Rautjärvi is a municipality in South Karelia, Finland. As of 30 September 2023, 3,047 people lived there. Neighbouring municipalities are Parikkala and Ruokolahti. It is on the eastern border with Russia. The administrative center is Simpele. == Other websites == * Municipality of Rautjärvi – Official website Category:Municipalities of South Karelia
title: Rautjärvi
